r.d: The purpose of this driver is to provide exceptionally thin glue between MongoDB and PHP, implementing only fundemental and performance-critical components necessary to build a fully-functional MongoDB driver.
r.n: ** Bug * [PHPC-940] - php_phongo_free_ssl_opt() attempts to free interned strings * [PHPC-948] - BSON encoding should throw on circular references * [PHPC-949] - Memory leak if Serializable::bsonSerialize() returns keys with null bytes
